name: patent_application_type
description: patent application series code: 01-17 = utility application; 29 = design application; 35 = international design applications; 60-62 = provisional application; 90 = ex parte reexamination request; 95 = inter partes reexamination request; 96 = supplemental examination

name: filing_date
description: date of application filing, ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD

name: rule_47_flag
description: flag for inventor who was unable to be contacted at filing of patent
